name: Very simple darker background
description: Darker background, emphasized active tab & urlbar for themed & non-themed Firefox's.
additional_info: I got the idea from https://userstyles.org/styles/117560/firefox-windows-10-darker-tab-bar and applied some transparency instead of constant color, so it works with my themes as well. Applied as black and 40% transparency so it makes tab bar darker, can be edited easily. Didn't try on Win 10 yet.
